start.welcomeText: Welcome to Velocity, the technology stack of the future!

authText.loggedOut: To get started, <registerLink>create an account</registerLink> or <loginLink>log in with an existing account</loginLink>.
authText.loggedIn: If it's not you, <logoutLink>log out</logoutLink> to switch to another account.

notFound.notFoundText2: Unfortunately, the page you are looking for could not be found.
notFound.tryAgainLater: Please try again later or go <startLink>back to the Start Page</startLink>.

error.errorText2: Unfortunately, an unexpected technical issue has occured. We apologize for the inconvenience.
error.tryAgainLater: Please try again later or try going back <startLink>back to the Start Page</startLink>.
